text: "Someday" is a 1986 song by Steve Earle and is the third single from their debut studio album Guitar Town. It went to number 28 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 31 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart. It was used in the 2007 movie Bridge to Terabithia ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:Steve Earle songs
title: Someday (Steve Earle song)
